keywords: ['edm', 'clapping', 'filtered synth melody', 'echoing synth lead melody', 'energetic riser', 'snare roll', 'synth pad chords', 'energetic', 'build up', 'exciting']
caption: The EDM song features an echoing synth lead melody, snare rolls, synth pad chords, energetic riser and some claps. In the second half of the loop, there is a filtered synth melody building up. It sounds energetic and exciting, as this is probably a build up section, after which comes a drop and like something you would hear in a club.
